name: Pyramid Solitaire Mummys Curse
description:
Follow an enigmatic Cleopatra and her spooky companion, The Mummy, into the deserts of Ancient Egypt to play Pyramid Solitaire: Mummy’s Curse. Under the sand dunes lies a pyramid, waiting to be raised. Will you be able to uncover its hidden treasure?

With detailed graphics, clear-cut sound effects and, above all, relaxing gameplay, you will be captivated by its moreish quality. One game will never seem enough, especially as you can track your progress on our scoreboard!

It’s easy to learn. Simply match cards which add to 13 to remove them. Clear all the cards up to the peak to win the round and unveil an ancient pyramid. But be quick! The less time you take, the larger your score bonus!

Try to better your time with each round or compete with friends with online scores. You can even compete against yourself and others in your home with the additional local score board.

FEATURES OF MUMMY'S CURSE PYRAMID
- High Quality graphics of a spooky ancient Egypt
- Simple to play; just tap away!
- Global Leader Boards
- Atmospheric Sound Effects
- The original accumulative score mode. When the high scoreboard in the game is full, you can keep on trying to beat each other!
- One of the most beloved types of solitaire, a totally different game to Tri-Peaks, Spider Solitaire and Klondike!

As a universal application, this card game adapts to look and play perfectly on either your iPhone or iPad.

Simply put, this is the best version of pyramid solitaire you can get.
